name: .ASI File Extension
summary: Learn about .ASI files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: ASI files are not meant to be opened. To use an ASI file with Grand Theft Auto IV, Grand Theft Auto V, or Red Dead Redemption 2:
Download a ScriptHook library for your game. ScriptHook libraries include GTA IV ASI Loader (for GTA IV), ScriptHookV (for GTA V), and ScriptHookRDR2 (for RDR 2).
Place your ScriptHook's .DLL file(s) in your game's installation directory (alongside the game's .EXE file).
Copy your ASI file to your game's installation directory.
The next time you open the game you modified, the mod your ASI file contains will be applied.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
